# GitHub Repository Settings

Configure these settings after creating the repository for maximum discoverability.

## Topics (Tags)

## Description

```
Train reasoning models on your Mac. GRPO training framework for Apple Silicon with curriculum learning, two-phase generation, and smart token masking.
```

## Website

```
https://github.com/adeelahmad/mlx-guided-grpo#readme
```

## Social Preview

Create a social preview image (1280x640px) with:
- Project name: MLX Guided GRPO
- Tagline: Train reasoning models on your Mac
- Apple logo + brain emoji
- Dark background with orange/blue accents

## Features to Enable

- [x] Issues
- [x] Projects
- [x] Discussions (optional)
- [x] Sponsorships (via FUNDING.yml)
- [ ] Wiki (not needed, use docs/)

## Branch Protection (after first push)

For `main` branch:
- Require pull request reviews
- Require status checks to pass
